description:
When you want to wear base layers or tights but want a bit of a flair, grab this thermal skirt. With quick-drying and breathable polyester, and an elastic waist band, the Tirill thermal skirt is an easy way to add warmth with style to your favourite leggings.

  • Polyester fabric holds onto warmth and wicks away moisture so you can enjoy the cold weather for longer
  • Side pockets hold your essentials or snacks for a mid-run stop
  • Elastic waist band with drawstring means you can find your perfect fit
name: Kari Traa Tirill Thermal Skirt - Women's
